item.title: How to Learn a Language
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: I've been a linguophile for a long time, and I'm always studying a little bit of some language or another. However, it's only recently that I've finally figured out the way that works best for me, with the help of modern technology. Perhaps this might help those of you who have been planning on learning a language some day.
